data.name: plResults.Help
data.value: Enter the maximum number of results to display (leave blank for no maximum)

data.name: plTitle.Help
data.value: Enter the maximum number of characters to display for the title (leave blank for no maximum)

data.name: plDescription.Help
data.value: Enter the maximum number of characters to display for the description (leave blank for no maximum)

data.name: plShowDescription.Help
data.value: Check if you want to show the Description for a Search Result

data.name: plPage.Help
data.value: Enter the number of results to display on each page (leave blank to use 10 as default)

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
About Search Results Settings

The Search Results Module displays the results of a user search. There are 5 Search Results Settings that control the display and action performed within the module.

  • Maximum Search Results – Enter the maximum number of items the search should return.
  • Results Per Page - Enter the maximum number of search items to be show on each page.
  • Maximum Title Length - Enter the number of characters of the module Title where the string was matched.  Leave blank to default to the length of the module Title where the search string was found..
  • Maximum Description Length - Enter the number of characters to display of  the text where the input search string was matched.. Leave blank to default to the length of the input search string.  The resulting string displayed is not the actual search input string, but the start of the where the search string was found.
  • Show Description - Check the option checkbox to display the input search string.  The number of characters displayed is controlled by the Maximum Description Length value above.

data.name: Validation.ErrorMessage
data.value: Must be an integer greater than zero.
